product_name: Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover
long_description: The Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover offers flexible, durable and quick-mounting protection against sun or rain when attached to the Kid Comfort I or II (sold separately).
short_description: The Deuter Kid Comfort Sun Roof and Rain Cover offers flexible, durable and quick-mounting protection against sun or rain when attached to the Kid Comfort I or II (sold separately).
